Was your roommate making bombs? Because.clean: Was your roommate making bombs? Because with all the materials she has in here, it looks like she was learning how to make Craft bombs.

site.raw: Was your roommate making bombs? Because with all the materials she has in here, it looks like she was learning how to make Craft bombs.

game.en_raw: Was your roommate making bombs?\!\ Because with all the materials she has in here,\!\ it looks like she was learning how to make Craft bombs.
game.jp: ルームメイトは爆弾でも作っていたのか？ ここにある材料を見ると、クラフト爆弾を作っていたようだ。
game.jp_raw: ルームメイトは爆弾でも作っていたのか？\!\ ここにある材料を見ると、\!クラフト爆弾を作っていたようだ。

game.jp_raw: \m[vm]えっ！？\!\ そんな！！！\!\ そうなの？？

game.jp: アハハハ！
ハハッ！
アハハ！

I'm just saying. She has the materials t.clean: I'm just saying. She has the materials to make a Craft bomb.
